INSERT INTO TSJX_INFOMATION ( ID, CATAGORY_BIG_ID, CATAGORY_BIG_NAME, CATAGORY_MID_ID, CATAGORY_MID_NAME, CATAGORY_ID, CATAGORY_NAME, BRAND_ID, BRAND_NAME, MODEL_ID, MODEL_NAME, IS_NEW, SELL_TYPE, EQUIPMENT_CONDITION, PROCEDURES, SRC, EQUIP_YEAR, WORK_TIME, PRICE, SERIAL_NUM, IN_STOCK_CODE, REMARK, EQUIPMENT_LOCATION, PUB_TIME, VALID_TIME, STOCK_COUNT, SELL_COUNT, USER_ID, IS_TOP, STATUS, audit_type, WEIGHT, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY, DELETED, price_unit ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryBigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryBigName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catagoryMidId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryMidName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catagoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procedures,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inStockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_TSJX_INFOMATION.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE TSJX_INFOMATION
CATAGORY_BIG_ID = #{catagoryBigId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATAGORY_BIG_NAME = #{catagoryBigName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATAGORY_MID_ID = #{catagoryMidId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATAGORY_MID_NAME = #{catagoryMidName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CATAGORY_ID = #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CATAGORY_NAME = #{catagoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BRAND_NAME = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_ID = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MODEL_NAME = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_NEW = #{isNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_TYPE = #{sellType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENT_CONDITION = #{equipmentCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCEDURES = #{procedures,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIP_YEAR = #{equipYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TIME = #{workTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_STOCK_CODE = #{inStockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENT_LOCATION = #{equipmentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUB_TIME = #{pubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_COUNT = #{stockCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_COUNT = #{sellCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_type = #{auditType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_unit = #{priceUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID id, CATAGORY_BIG_ID catagoryBigId, CATAGORY_BIG_NAME catagoryBigName, CATAGORY_MID_ID catagoryMidId, CATAGORY_MID_NAME catagoryMidName, CATAGORY_ID catagoryId, CATAGORY_NAME catagoryName, BRAND_ID brandId, BRAND_NAME brandName, MODEL_ID modelId, MODEL_NAME modelName, IS_NEW isNew, SELL_TYPE sellType, EQUIPMENT_CONDITION equipmentCondition, PROCEDURES procedures, SRC src, EQUIP_YEAR equipYear, WORK_TIME workTime, PRICE price, SERIAL_NUM serialNum, IN_STOCK_CODE inStockCode, REMARK remark, EQUIPMENT_LOCATION equipmentLocation, PUB_TIME pubTime, VALID_TIME validTime, STOCK_COUNT stockCount, SELL_COUNT sellCount, USER_ID userId, IS_TOP isTop, STATUS status, audit_type auditType, WEIGHT weight, CREATE_TIME createTime, CREATE_BY createBy, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, MODIFY_BY modifyBy, DELETED deleted, price_unit priceUnit

SELECT i.ID id, i.CATAGORY_BIG_ID catagoryBigId, i.CATAGORY_BIG_NAME catagoryBigName, i.CATAGORY_MID_ID catagoryMidId, i.CATAGORY_MID_NAME catagoryMidName, i.CATAGORY_ID catagoryId, i.CATAGORY_NAME catagoryName, i.BRAND_ID brandId, i.BRAND_NAME brandName, i.MODEL_ID modelId, i.MODEL_NAME modelName, i.IS_NEW isNew, i.SELL_TYPE sellType, i.EQUIPMENT_CONDITION equipmentCondition, i.PROCEDURES procedures, i.SRC src, i.EQUIP_YEAR equipYear, i.WORK_TIME workTime, i.PRICE price, i.SERIAL_NUM serialNum, i.IN_STOCK_CODE inStockCode, i.REMARK remark, i.EQUIPMENT_LOCATION equipmentLocation, i.PUB_TIME pubTime, i.VALID_TIME validTime, i.STOCK_COUNT stockCount, i.SELL_COUNT sellCount, i.USER_ID userId, i.IS_TOP isTop, i.STATUS status, i.audit_type auditType, i.WEIGHT weight, i.CREATE_TIME createTime, i.CREATE_BY createBy, i.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, i.MODIFY_BY modifyBy, i.DELETED deleted, i.price_unit priceUnit
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TSJX_INFOMATION i LEFT JOIN TSJX_USER u ON i.user_id=u.id
,u.real_name as userName FROM TSJX_INFOMATION i LEFT JOIN TSJX_USER u ON i.user_id=u.id
